    • Class client.component.PiecePane

      • Serialized Fields

        • actionListeners
          List<ActionListener> actionListeners
          List of all components listening for adapter events fromt this pane.
        • highlightedTiles
          List<Coordinate> highlightedTiles
          List of tiles that should be highlighted, used to display legal moves.
        • latestPosition
          BoardInfo latestPosition
          The latest position drawPosition was called with.
        • playerColor
          Piece.Color playerColor
          The color of the current player, used to change the perspective of the board.

    • Class client.view.GameView

      class GameView extends View implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • client
          jnet.JClientSocket client
          The client used for network communication.
        • piecePane
          PiecePane piecePane
          Main graphical component (contains the board and pieces, responsible for moves).
        • server
          jnet.JServer server
          The server hosted by this client, null is not applicable.

  • Package engine.board

    • Class engine.board.BoardInfo

      class BoardInfo extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • castlek
          boolean castlek
          Whether black castling on the kingside is allowed.
        • castleK
          boolean castleK
          Whether white castling on the kingside is allowed.
        • castleq
          boolean castleq
          Whether black castling on the queenside is allowed.
        • castleQ
          boolean castleQ
          Whether white castling on the queenside is allowed.
        • enPassantTile
          Coordinate enPassantTile
          The tile, if one exists, onto which a pawn can move to capture en passant style. This is not the tile on which the enemy pawn exists, but the tile immediately behind the enemy pawn (where said pawn would be if it had only moved one tile forward instead of two).
        • fenString
          String fenString
          The state of the board as a Forsythâ€“Edwards Notation (FEN) string.
        • fullmoves
          int fullmoves
          The running total of fullmoves made. Incremented after the black player's turn.
        • halfmoves
          int halfmoves
          The number of halfmoves since the last pawn move. Used to enforce the 50-move rule.
        • threefoldRepetitionTracker
          Map<String,Integer> threefoldRepetitionTracker
          A mapping of all the FEN strings and the number of times they occured during the game.
        • tiles
          Piece[][] tiles
          The board.
        • tilesOpponentControls
          List<Coordinate> tilesOpponentControls
          A list of tiles controlled by the enemy player.
        • whiteToMove
          boolean whiteToMove
          Whether it is the white player's turn to move.
